items.sentence: We must avoid getting involved at all costs.
Tom bought a new towel rack for the kitchen.
I'm indeed delighted and honored to be here.
If you haven't already done so, buy one now.
This isn't the kind of cheese I usually buy.
We must baby Mary until she gets well again.
Mary keeps her jewels locked up in the bank.
It'll take a long time to finish doing this.
Tom bumped into Mary again later at a party.
This is the teacher I was telling you about.
I don't understand the meaning of this word.
I wouldn't want to marry someone who's lazy.
You're not suggesting Tom did that, are you?
I'll ask Tom whether he wants another drink.
I'll do what you whatever you tell me to do.
I'll probably not be in Boston next weekend.
I'll go surfing with Tom tomorrow afternoon.
I'll know not to do that that way next time.
The head teacher introduced the new teacher.
Tom is the one who comes up with everything.
